players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: remained silent.
You: "I didn't kill Alice, I was with Diana. Charlie might be lying."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob and found him to be the mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he will lie. Vote Bob."
You: "I didn't kill Alice, I was with Diana. Charlie is lying. Diana is the only other suspect."
Diana: "I think Charlie is mafia. Bob is innocent. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob and found him to be mafia. Bob knows I'm detective, so he'll lie. Diana, you were silent, but you can't be mafia. Vote Bob."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: remained silent.
Bob: "I didn't kill Alice, I was with Diana. Charlie might be lying."
You: "I investigated Bob and found him to be the mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he will lie. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I didn't kill Alice, I was with Diana. Charlie is lying. Diana is the only other suspect."
Diana: "I think Charlie is mafia. Bob is innocent. Vote Charlie."
You: "I investigated Bob and found him to be mafia. Bob knows I'm detective, so he'll lie. Diana, you were silent, but you can't be mafia. Vote Bob."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Bob was arrested
